arena_elo.name: Chatbot Arena ELO
arena_elo.description: Human preference ranking from 6M+ votes. Best predictor of real-world usefulness.

aider_polyglot.name: Aider Polyglot
aider_polyglot.description: Real-world coding benchmark across 6 languages. Only major benchmark tracking cost.

livebench.name: LiveBench
livebench.description: Contamination-resistant benchmark updated monthly with new questions.

mmlu.name: MMLU
mmlu.description: Massive Multitask Language Understanding. SATURATED - top models cluster within 2-4%.
mmlu.warning: Saturated benchmark - no longer differentiates frontier models

humaneval.name: HumanEval
humaneval.description: Code generation benchmark. SATURATED - SOTA at 99.4%.

bigcodebench.name: BigCodeBench
bigcodebench.description: Challenging code benchmark with 36% gap between human (97%) and best models (61%).

gpqa_diamond.name: GPQA Diamond
gpqa_diamond.description: Graduate-level science QA. Still challenging but approaching saturation at 90%.
